content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: smooth_quartz_slab
inventory=[{"type": "birch_log", "quantity": 35, "index": 19}, {"type": "lime_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "smooth_quartz", "quantity": 3, "index": 32}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral", "quantity": 22, "index": 41}, {"type": "turtle_egg", "quantity": 22, "index": 44}]

thought: The first step to crafting the smooth quartz slab is to move one piece of smooth quartz into the crafting grid. Since the first empty slot in the crafting grid is slot 1, we will move the smooth quartz there.
act: move from slot 32 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: smooth_quartz_slab
inventory=[{"type": "smooth_quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "birch_log", "quantity": 35, "index": 19}, {"type": "lime_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "smooth_quartz", "quantity": 2, "index": 32}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral", "quantity": 22, "index": 41}, {"type": "turtle_egg", "quantity": 22, "index": 44}]

thought: The second step to crafting the smooth quartz slab is to move another piece of smooth quartz into the crafting grid. Since the second empty slot in the crafting grid is slot 2, we will move the smooth quartz there.
act: move from slot 32 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: smooth_quartz_slab
inventory=[{"type": "smooth_quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "smooth_quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "birch_log", "quantity": 35, "index": 19}, {"type": "lime_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "smooth_quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral", "quantity": 22, "index": 41}, {"type": "turtle_egg", "quantity": 22, "index": 44}]

thought: The third step to crafting the smooth quartz slab is to move the last piece of smooth quartz into the crafting grid. Since the third empty slot in the crafting grid is slot 3, we will move the smooth quartz there.
act: move from slot 32 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: smooth_quartz_slab
inventory=[{"type": "smooth_quartz_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "smooth_quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "smooth_quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "smooth_quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "birch_log", "quantity": 35, "index": 19}, {"type": "lime_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral", "quantity": 22, "index": 41}, {"type": "turtle_egg", "quantity": 22, "index": 44}]

thought: The fourth step to crafting the smooth quartz slab is to move the resulting six smooth quartz slabs from the crafting grid to an empty slot in the inventory. Since the first empty slot in the inventory is slot 11, we will move the smooth quartz slabs there.
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 6
